## Three Counties of Southern Maryland

```{r}
library(leaflet)
county_map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(lat=c(38.311745,38.560159,38.525590),
               lng=c(-76.599418,-76.575053,-76.978393),
               popup=c("St. Mary's County","Calvert County","Charles County"))
county_map
```
